name: Windsor - Grand Strategy MMO
description:
Pre-Alpha Game

Windsor is a massively multiplayer grand strategy game currently in the very early stages of development. Players raise armies and construct buildings as in an RTS using the ability to move forward or backward in time. You will need to balance constructing new buildings, gathering resources, joining kingdoms, and undergoing combat. The game features many combat mechanics for attacking other players, their towns, and armies, including different advantages and disadvantages for types of armies. Players can also form alliances with other players through the kingdom system. This system provides many bonuses to players that join a kingdom.
